'''Verity Cells''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]] found in the Ruins of King Deshret.

They can cause invisible objects that had their original appearances obscured to reappear, including walls, floors, [[Ruins Torch]]es, and more.
